entry.title: ANYPREVOUT in place of CTV
entry.summary: The context discusses the importance of byte-efficiency in APO-AS for potential vault users, and how it may be less important compared to lightning noninteractive channel users. The author also mentions the deployment of new applications such as Eltoo and blind statechains, which can be leveraged using ANYPREVOUT. This change is seen as less controversial and requires a smaller code change.
